official-title.#text:
To amend the South Carolina National Heritage Corridor
		  Act of 1996 to designate the management entity for the South Carolina National
		  Heritage Corridor, and for other purposes.

sponsor.#tail: introduced the following bill; which was referred to the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: is amended to read as follows:

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text:
Section 605(a) of the South Carolina
			 National Heritage Corridor Act of 1996
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: South Carolina National Heritage Corridor Act of 1996/s:605/ss:a

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text:
title VI of division II of Public Law
			 104–333

header.#text:
South Carolina National
			 Heritage Corridor Management Entity

text.#text:
The management entity
				for the National Heritage Corridor shall be the South Carolina Heritage
				Corridor, Inc. All program funds, past, present, and future, shall be
				transferred immediately to the South Carolina Heritage Corridor,
				Inc.
